title: 'It's easy to scare people': Europe's decision to pull AstraZeneca-Oxford vaccine threatens global COVID-19 recovery efforts, US experts say
content:
1. 'It's easy to scare people': Europe's decision to pull AstraZeneca-Oxford vaccine threatens global COVID-19 recovery efforts, US experts say  USA TODAY

  4. Opinion: Do not write off the AstraZeneca vaccine  DW (English)
  5. The overreaction to the AstraZeneca blood clot issue is the last thing the world needs now  The Independent

localize.title: '很容易吓到人'。美国专家称，欧洲决定撤消阿斯利康-牛津疫苗，威胁到全球COVID-19的恢复工作。
'很容易嚇到人'。美國專家稱，歐洲決定撤消阿斯利康-牛津疫苗，威脅到全球COVID-19的恢復工作。
